class.name: Phaser.Physics.P2.Spring

parameters.name: world
parameters.help: A reference to the P2 World.

parameters.name: restLength
parameters.help: Rest length of the spring. A number > 0.

parameters.name: stiffness
parameters.help: Stiffness of the spring. A number >= 0.

parameters.name: damping
parameters.help: Damping of the spring. A number >= 0.

parameters.name: worldA
parameters.help: Where to hook the spring to body A in world coordinates. This value is an array with 2 elements matching x and y, i.e: [32, 32].

parameters.name: worldB
parameters.help: Where to hook the spring to body B in world coordinates. This value is an array with 2 elements matching x and y, i.e: [32, 32].

parameters.name: localA
parameters.help: Where to hook the spring to body A in local body coordinates. This value is an array with 2 elements matching x and y, i.e: [32, 32].

parameters.name: localB
parameters.help: Where to hook the spring to body B in local body coordinates. This value is an array with 2 elements matching x and y, i.e: [32, 32].

class.help: Creates a linear spring, connecting two bodies. A spring can have a resting length, a stiffness and damping.
